content: the same basic template is used for all three stockings but with three different stitch patterns for the leg and foot feel free to substitute your own favorite stitch pattern as long as it divides evenly into 72 stitches each stocking begins with an i-cord that forms the top edge and the hanging loop stitches are then picked up along the i-cord and worked downward to create the stocking a short-row heel and a star toe give the finished product a simple look that won t distract from your chosen stitch pattern finished measurements foot circumference = 12in/30cm foot length = 8in/20cm easily adjusted leg length = 12in/30cm easily adjusted materials 180-230yds/165-210m of aran weight yarn per stocking samples used patons sws soy wool solids 70% wool 30% soy 110yds/100m per 2 8oz/80g skein -cable sample 2 skeins #70012 natural -lattice sample 2 skeins #70008 natural snow -chevron sample 2 skeins #70008 natural snow and 1 skein #70012 natural us 8/5mm needles cable needle tapestry needle gauge 20 sts/24 row = 4in/10cm in stockinette stitch if you re having trouble with any of my patterns or simply want to show off your project please feel free to visit my ravelry group carissa browning designs 1 1 https //www ravelry com/groups/carissa-browning-designs
